content.rendered:
Welcome!

Complete tourist medical package, so that you can carry out your aesthetic treatment and enjoy the best stay in Bogotá, Colombia

Medical Tourism

We have strategic alliances that provide comfort and security from the first moment until your departure. Our foreign and out-of-town patients are prepared and relaxed during their visit: their entire tourist medical package is arranged prior to their arrival.

The Obesity and Aging Clinic, located in Bogotá, Colombia, has 15 years of experience serving patients from different parts of the world, where it has made its entire team available to them to have a satisfactory experience during their stay in our facilities and the city.

Advantages and Benefits
Tour Package Planning
Step by step

Advantages and Benefits

Thanks to so many years of service we have managed to optimize our infrastructure and complementary services so that everything goes perfectly, these are some of the benefits:

  • Transportation from Airport to Hotel / Hotel to Airport
  • Accommodation at the Hotel Plaza Suites (Breakfast included in your reservation)
  • 24-hour nurse support
  • Medical assessment
  • Laboratory exams
  • Health insurance
  • Post-surgical control
  • Surgery kit
  • Postoperative kit
  • Covid-19 tests
  • Tourist partner to know the city and surroundings (optional)
Book an appointment

Tourist medical package planning

Step by step to plan your tourist medical package

  1. First contact with the Obesity and Aging Clinic (Bogotá DC, Colombia).
  2. Virtual initial assessment request, carried out by our team of doctors.
  3. Budget of the procedure based on the final assessment of Dr. Cubillos.
  4. Scheduling and payment of the medical package (must have a minimum of 10 days of stay).
  5. Announce to the clinic team the date and time of your arrival to have your arrival transportation arranged.
Step by step
Book your Appointment

Step by step from your stay to your surgery

1

Arrival in Bogota, Colombia

 

When you arrive in the city of Bogotá D.C, Colombia, a person from our team will be waiting with your name to take you to your accommodation at the Hotel Plaza Suites located a few meters from our clinic. Once installed, you will have your first appointment with Dr. Gabriel Cubillos for the first medical assessment, and later he will give you the order of laboratory tests to identify different aspects of his health conditions. PLAZA SUITES HOTEL OFFICIAL WEBSITE https://plazasuitesbogota.com/
Book an Appointment

2

Surgical Preparation

All our patients must follow a series of preparation and assessment steps in different lest generation equipment

  • Order laboratory tests
  • Reading laboratory tests
  • Preparation of 5 days with our equipment and appliances.
  • Previous medication
  • Prior anesthesiology appointment
Book an Appointment

3

The Big Day

When the big day arrives, you must follow all the instructions given by our medical team and Dr. Cubillos. Consider the recommendations, such as:

  • Come in comfortable clothes.
  • Preferably accompanied by a family member or guardian.
  • Remove makeup and other beauty products.
  • Your arrival at the clinic must be 1 hour before your scheduled surgery time.
  • Comply with the food recommendations given by the anesthesiologist.
  • Have a nurse assigned so that at the end of the surgery she begins her 24-hour follow-up shift.
Book an Appointment

1

Arrival in Bogota, Colombia

When you arrive in the city of Bogotá D.C, Colombia, a person from our team will be waiting with your name to take you to your accommodation at the Hotel Plaza Suites located a few meters from our clinic.

Once installed, you will have your first appointment with Dr. Gabriel Cubillos for the first medical assessment, and later he will give you the order of laboratory tests to identify different aspects of his health conditions. PLAZA SUITES HOTEL OFFICIAL WEBSITE https://plazasuitesbogota.com/

Book your appointment

2

Surgical Preparation

All our patients must follow a series of preparation and assessment steps in different lest generation equipment

  • Order laboratory tests
  • Reading laboratory tests
  • Preparation of 5 days with our equipment and appliances.
  • Previous medication
  • Prior anesthesiology appointment
Book your appointment

3

The Big Day

When the big day arrives, you must follow all the instructions given by our medical team and Dr. Cubillos. Consider the recommendations, such as:

  • Come in comfortable clothes.
  • Preferably accompanied by a family member or guardian.
  • Remove makeup and other beauty products.
  • Your arrival at the clinic must be 1 hour before your scheduled surgery time.
  • Comply with the food recommendations given by the anesthesiologist.
  • Have a nurse assigned so that at the end of the surgery she begins her 24-hour follow-up shift.
Book your appointment

Tourism in bogotá and surroundings

– Optional –

The tourism agency that is part of the Plaza Suites Hotel can help you organize guided tours to different places of leisure, culture, and attractions in the city and its surroundings. There are very interesting places that you should not miss, such as the Candelaria neighborhood, Usaquen, the Gold Museum and Monserrate, which represent all of the capital’s tradition.

Likewise, you can visit exclusive restaurants and shopping centers in the best areas of the city, or go to the handicraft stores and jewelry stores that sell emeralds known to be the best in the world.

It is recommended to visit the Salt Cathedral of Zipaquirá on the outskirts of the city, a marvelous work between nature and engineering.

More Information
